ncf module¶

This modules contains netCDF related functions

ncf.km2m(var)[source]¶

Convert m to km.

Read Input and convert it to from km -> m (if needed). The input must have ‘units’ attribute set to ‘km’ to trigger the conversion.

Parameters:vrs – A netCDF variable.
Returns:Altitude (scalar or array) converted to km.
ncf.load_nc(file_in)[source]¶

Return pointer to netCDF file and its variables.

Parameters:file_in (str) – File name.
Returns:Tuple containing
  • Pointer to file.
  • Pointer to file variables.
